entries: The pit fiend magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The pit fiend casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil' innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Chilling Frost
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the devil takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and can't use reactions until the end of the devil's next turn.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its ice spear, and one with its tail. It can use its Frost Ray in place of a melee attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Frost Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Ruthless Command (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the devil can issue a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage and can add a {@dice d10} to its roll provided it can understand the devil. A creature can beneft from only one ruthless command die at a time. This effect ends if the devil is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Wall of Ice {@recharge}
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. The creature then makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the s pace the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The devil makes a bite, ice spear, tail, or frost ray attack.

legendary.name: Command
entries: The devil targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the devil, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Blizzard (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Blinding snow and freezing jagged ice cascade and swirl magically around the devil. Each creature within 20 feet of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage and is {@condition blinded} and can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last until the end of the devil's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks: two with its spiked chain and one with its tail. It can use its Hurl Flame or Spiked Chain Slam in place of one spiked chain attack.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). While a creature is {@condition grappled} this way, the horned devil can't use one of its spiked chain attacks.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct,it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or lose 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Spiked Chain Slam
entries: The devil slams a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by its spiked chain into another creature or a solid surface within 20 feet. Both creatures must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Sweeping Spiked Chains {@recharge 5}
entries: The devil expertly whirls its spiked chains rapidly around in a wide sweeping arc, and every creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 28 ({@dice 4d10 + 6}) slashing damage and, if it is Large or smaller, is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. The devil can't use this feature if it has a creature {@condition grappled} by its spiked chains.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The devil moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The devil makes one spiked chain, tail, or hurl flame attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The devil casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The erinyes's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). The chain erinyes ascendant can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature hostile to the erinyes that starts its turn within 20 feet of the erinyes must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, unless the erinyes is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target can't perform any actions except move up to half its speed. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the erinyes's Aura of Dread for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Indomitable (2/day)
entries: The erinyes can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The erinyes makes three attacks.

action.name: Longword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The poison lasts until it is removed by the {@spell lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The erinyes magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The erinyes adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The erinyes moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The erinyes makes one Longsword attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The erinyes magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The erinyes casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The chain devil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The chain devil ascendant can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chain devil ascendant makes three attacks with its chains.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Chain Slam
entries: The chain devil ascendant slams a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by its chain into another creature or a solid surface within its reach. If slammed into another creature, both creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Whirling Chains {@recharge}
entries: The chain devil ascendant moves up to half its walking speed and targets each creature within 15 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

The chain devil ascendant's movement during this action will not provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}. If the chain devil ascendant has a creature {@condition grappled} by any of its chains (not the animated ones), the creature automatically fails is saving throw but is immediately released to a random space within 10 feet of the chain devil ascendant's space where it began to use Whirling Chains.

action.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razoredged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.

Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The devil can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Tyranny
entries: An ally that is within 30 feet of the devil and can see and hear the devil and has less hit points than the devil has advantage to saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spur Allies
entries: As a bonus action, the devil targets up to two allies within 30 feet that can see and hear the devil and must have less hit points than the devil. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage and uses its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the devil's choice that is within 120 feet of the devil and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the devil's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Battle Frenzy
entries: While it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it, the bearded devil enforcer gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and all melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks rolls against it have advantage.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: The devil can't be {@condition frightened} while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with thi s attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). The devil can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to being {@condition frightened} by the devil's claw for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the devil can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the devil can't make tail attacks.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the devil can see targets it with an attack, the devil chooses another ally within 5 feet of it. The two swap places, and the chosen ally becomes the target instead.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (2/Day)
entries: When a creature the devil can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, and the creature can hear the devil, the devil grants advantage to that roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The marilith general can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Rapid Shapechanger
entries: The yochlol elder can use a bonus action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Maddening Webs
entries: A creature that starts its turn in a space filled with webbing conjured by the yochlol elder's web spell takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walking
entries: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. (15 ft. in demon form), one target. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Amorphous Flurry (Demon Form only) {@recharge 5}
entries: The yochlol makes four slam attacks.

action.name: Noxious Mist Form
entries: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the yochlol is {@condition incapacitated} and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The yochlol elder teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vrock's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). The vrock doomsayer can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demonn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vrock doomsayer makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spores {@recharge 5}
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. Until this poison ends, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of {@item holy water (flask)|phb|holy water} on the target also ends the effect on it.

action.name: Stunning Screech {@recharge}
entries: The vrock emits a horrifc screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Dance of Ruin (1/Day)
entries: The vrock doomsayer joins hands with at least 2 other vrocks in a circle, chanting and performing a wild ritual dance for 3 consecutive turns. They share the same initiative, and take their turns at the same time. At the end of 3 turns of dancing, a violent wave of crackling, infernal energy explodes in a 100-foot radius, centered on the vrocks. Each target caught in the explosion that isn't a demon must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} lightning damage and {@damage 6d6} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. For each additional vrock that joins in the dance, the damage increases by {@damage 2d6} lightning damage and {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage, to a maximum of {@damage 10d6} lightning damage and {@dice 10d6} necrotic when five or more vrocks are dancing.
The dance of ruin immediately ends if the vrock doomsayer is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or if the number of vrocks performing the dance drops below 3.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1 {@dice d1}
0) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Insidious Darkness (1/Day)
entries: Magical darkness surges forth from the demon, filling a 30-foot radius sphere centering around it and spreading around corners. A creature with {@sense darkvision} can't see through this darkness. Non-magical light, as well as light created by spells of 4th level or lower, can't illuminate the area. Demonic cackling, screams, and laughter can be heard within the sphere.

Whenever a creature that isn't a demon starts its turn in the sphere, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The demon must concentrate to maintain the insidious darkness (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The nalfeshnee's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). The nalfeshnee can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. If both claw attacks hit the same creature, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 5d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Horror Nimbus {@recharge 5}
entries: The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 20 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the initial saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} in this way. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Ruthless Command (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the nalfeshnee can issue a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage and can add a {@dice d10} to its roll provided it can understand the nalfeshnee. A creature can beneft from only one ruthless command die at a time. This effect ends if the nalfeshnee is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The nalfeshnee makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Command
entries: The nalfeshnee targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the nalfeshnee, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The nalfeshnee casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The marilith's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The marilith can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marilith makes seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks.

action.name: Bladestorm {@recharge 5}
entries: The marilith moves up to its walking speed and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 43 ({@damage 6d12 + 5}) slashing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage. The marilith's movement during this action will not provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Ruthless Command (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the marilith can issue a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage and can add a {@dice d12} to its roll provided it can understand the marilith. A creature can beneft from only one ruthless command die at a time. This effect ends if the marilith is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The marilith adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Command
entries: The marilith targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the marilith, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Longsword
entries: The marilith makes a longsword attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the marilith must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw, taking 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one. The marilith can't use Tail Swipe if it has a creature {@condition grappled} with its tail.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the immolith's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The immolith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the immolith or hits it with a melee attack while with in 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the immolith can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The immolith sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in an additional 20 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the immolith moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The immolith uses deathfire curse and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While a creature is {@condition grappled}, it loses resistance to fire. The immolith can have up to four creatures {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Deathfire Curse
entries: The immolith targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and catches fire, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns. An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to extinguish the fire. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hezrou's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). The hezrou can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sickening Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition stunned}. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's sickening stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) snittskada.

action.name: Ruthless Command (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the hezrou can issue a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage and can add a {@dice d8} to its roll provided it can understand the hezrou. A creature can beneft from only one ruthless command die at a time. This effect ends if the hezrou is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The hezrou magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The hezrou makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hezrou magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The hezrou casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 44 ({@damage 8d10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. If the target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goristro makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its fists, and one with its hoof. The goristro can use its Trample in place of its hoof attack if it is available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} för att träffa, räckvidd 3 meter, ett mål. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) blåslagningsskada.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}52 ({@damage 8d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The goristro moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the goristro enters must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the goristro's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the goristro remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the goristro. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 22} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the goristro and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The chasme's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}). The chasme can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Drone
entries: The chasme produces a horrid droning sound to which demons are immune. Any other creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the chasme must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes. A creature that can't hear the drone automatically succeeds on the save. The effect on the creature ends if it takes damage or if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to splash it with {@item holy water (flask)|phb|holy water}. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the drone for the next 24 hours. Demons are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chasme has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The chasme can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chasme attacks twice: one with its proboscis and one with its claws.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) necrotic damage, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. If this effect reduces a creature's hit point maximum to 0, the creature dies. This reduction to a creature's hit point maximum lasts until the creature finishes a long rest or until it is affected by a spell like {@spell greater restoration}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The glabrezu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Discord
entries: A creature hostile to the glabrezu that starts its turn within 20 feet of the glabrezu must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw, unless the glabrezu is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} until the start of its next turn.

While {@condition charmed} by the glabrezu, the creature must move up to its speed and make a melee weapon attack against a creature of the glabrezu's choice that the glabrezu can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks: two with its pincers and casts one spell.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the glabrezu can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the glabrezu's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the glabrezu or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the glabrezu, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the glabrezu's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The glabrezu moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Slam
entries: The glabrezu makes a fist attack.

legendary.name: Pincer (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The glabrezu makes a pincer attack.

legendary.name: Charm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The glabrezu uses its Fiendish Charm.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The glabrezu casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The barlgura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). The barlgura can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The barlgura has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the barlgura's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied barlgura that starts its turn within 30 feet of this barlgura that can see or hear this barlgura gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The barlgura's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists. If both fist attacks hit a Huge or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take an extra 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The barlgura abductor's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). The barlgura abductor can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The barlgura abductor's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barlgura abductor makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12({@dice 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Teleport (3/Day)
entries: The barlgura abductor magically teleports, along with any creature it is {@condition grappled} with and any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The balor's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). The balor can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balor can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the balor's choice that is within 120 feet of the balor and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the balor's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Meteor Strike (1/Day)
entries: While flying, the balor lord dives at least 40 feet toward a target space on the ground, creating a massive explosion 60 feet in diameter centered on the balor. This sprays rock and fire in all directions and forms a crater the size of the explosion.

Each creature within 30 feet of the target space must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one. Additionally, the ground in that area becomes difficult terrain is engulfed in flames for ten minutes. A creature that starts its turn in the area while it is still in flames takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. Each 5-foot-square portion of the area requires at least 30 minutes to clear by hand.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The balor moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Whip
entries: The balor makes a whip attack.

legendary.name: Longsword (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The balor makes a longsword attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The balor casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Infernal Blast Wave (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Infernal fire erupts and surges from the balor, striking creatures around it. Each creature within 20 feet of the balor must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and catches fire. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The death knight is a 19th-level spell caster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the death knight must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, unless the death knight is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the death knight by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to the death knight, the creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the death knight's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the death knight is {@condition incapacitated}, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the death knight hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal {@damage 2d8} radiant or necrotic damage to the target. If the death knight expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death knight uses Command Undead. It then makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Command Undead
entries: The death knight targets one undead ally it can see within 30 feet of it and gives it a telepathic command. The target can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one weapon attack.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
entries: The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) fire damage and 42 ({@damage 12d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The death knight makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The death knight moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Command
entries: The death knight uses its Command Undead ability.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The death knight casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to a creature, the mindmantle takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down) and that creature takes the other half.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The mindmantle can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mindmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

action.name: Crush
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the mindmantle attaches to the target. If the target is Medium or smaller and the mindmantle has advantage on the attack roll, it attaches by engulfng the target's head, and the target is also {@condition blinded} and unable to breathe while the mindmantle is attached in this way.

While attached to the target, the mindmantle can attack no other creature except the target but has advantage on its attack rolls. The mindmantle's speed also becomes 0, it can't beneft from any bonus to its speed, and it moves with the target.
A creature can detach the mindmantle by making a successful {@dc 13} Strength check as an action. On its turn, the mindmantle can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Darkness Aura (3/Day)
entries: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the mindmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the mindmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). {@sense Darkvision} can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

action.name: Madness
entries: A target the mindmantle is attached to must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw with disadvantage on the roll or be magically {@condition charmed} by the mindmantle until the mindmantle dies, is {@condition incapacitated}, or is detached from the target. While the target is {@condition charmed} in this way, it can telepathically see through the mindmantle's eyes.

The {@condition charmed} target is under the mindmantle's control and the mindmantle and the target can communicate telepathically. The mindmantle can choose to loosen its grip on the target's head so that the target can breathe.
On each of its turns, the {@condition charmed} target must move toward a creature of the mindmantle's choosing and make a melee attack against it if it is within reach.
On its subsequent turns, the mindmantle must use its action to maintain control over the target, or the effect ends.

The target can make a Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success. the spell ends. Also, whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclopskin has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclopskin makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) blåslagningsskada.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cyclops is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Heart of the Storm
entries: Whenever the cyclops casts a spell other than a cantrip that deals lightning or thunder damage, a stormy aura surrounds it. In addition to the spell's effects, creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning or thunder damage (cyclops' choice).

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The cyclops has 9 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the cyclops casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, it can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the cyclops casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, it can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the cyclops can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two greataxe attacks. It can use its Cleaving Swing in place of one of its greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Cleaving Swing {@recharge 5}
entries: The cyclops swings its greataxe, and every creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: Svärmen kan ta upp en annan varelses utrymme och vice versa, och svärmen kan förflytta sig genom alla öppningar som är tillräckligt stora för en klo. Svärmen kan inte återfå träffpunkter eller få tillfälliga träffpunkter.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice), or 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning or slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The greater couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the greater couatl can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The greater couatl doesn't provoke an {@action opportunity attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The greater couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The greater couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

trait.name: Twist Free
entries: The greater couatl automatically makes its saving throws against paralysis and being {@condition restrained} at the end of its turn as long as it is not {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The greater couatl makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours.
Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition unconscious}. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the greater couatl can't constrict another target.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The greater couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the greater couatl's choice).

In a new form, the greater couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the greater couatl can use its bite in that form.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The greater couatl makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The greater couatl teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The greater couatl casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Radiant Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The greater couatl emits a burst of radiant energy. All allies within 20 feet of the greater couatl regain 18 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points. All other creatures within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the cockatrice and the two of them can see each other, the cockatrice can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw if the cockatrice isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the cockatrice until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the cockatrice in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cockatrice makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its stinger.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw against being magically petrifed. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed for 24 hours.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) snittskada.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 9d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down). and that creature takes the other half.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the cloaker can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the cloaker can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can use its vampiric drain in place of its bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it. lf the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is {@condition blinded} and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a {@dc 17} Strength check.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Vampiric Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature the cloaker is attached to. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the cloaker regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way rises as a shadow under the cloaker's control.

action.name: Moan
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the cloaker's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Phantasms (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.

Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on senses other than sight.
A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

action.name: Shadow Jump
entries: If the cloaker is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the cloaker's choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 3d12 + 2}) necrotic damage.

The cloaker then magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it's attached to, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The cloaker lord's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). The cloaker lord can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to a creature, the cloaker lord takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down) and that creature takes the other half.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the cloaker lord remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the cloaker lord has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cloaker lord uses Command Cloaker. It then makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can use its moan or disrupting moan in place of its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker lord attaches to it. lf the cloaker lord has advantage against the target, the cloaker lord attaches to the target's head, and the target is {@condition blinded} and unable to breathe while the cloaker lord is attached. While attached, the cloaker lord can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker lord can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker lord by succeeding on a {@dc 19} Strength check.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Cloaker
entries: The cloaker lord targets an allied cloaker within 30 feet that can see and hear the cloaker lord. The target uses its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack.

action.name: Moan
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker lord that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, it is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} in this way. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker lord's moan for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Disrupting Moan {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker lord that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Phantasms {@recharge 5}
entries: The cloaker lord magically creates four illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker lord is the real one.
If the cloaker lord is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.

Whenever any creature targets the cloaker lord with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker lord or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on senses other than sight.
A duplicate has the cloaker lord's AC and uses its saving throws.
If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The cloaker lord moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The cloaker lord makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Command Cloaker
entries: The cloaker lord targets an allied cloaker within 30 feet that can see and hear the cloaker lord. The target uses its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The cloaker casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

monster.name: Uchuulun (Slime Chuul)
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The uchuulun can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Paralytic Slime
entries: The uchuulun is coated with paralytic slime. A creature that touches the uchuulun or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: The uchuulun senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The uchuulun makes two pincer attacks. If the uchuulun is grappling a creature, the uchuulun can also use its tentacles once.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.. The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the uchuulun doesn't have two other creatures {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the uchuulun must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed} and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The uchuulun magically emits psychic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 29 ({@damage 6d8 + 2}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Chuul Juggernaut
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
